introduction: No. 1 WordPress GST Solution in India. Make GST Compliance Effortless for WooCommerce. Easily manage taxes and auto-generate e-invoices with WooCommerce GST Plugin.
plugin_overview: WooGST Plugin helps streamline your business and simplify tax compliance with a fully GST-enabled WooCommerce store.
features: Configure GST Setting – Ensures your WooCommerce store is compliant with GST regulations.
Add Your Own TAX Slab – Supports single and multiple tax slabs (5%, 10%, 15%, etc.).
Built-in Invoice Features – Easily generate and download GST-compliant customized invoices with store branding.
GST Enabled WooCommerce – Fully compatible with WooCommerce.
Easy Upload and Install – Simple plugin download, license key activation, and usage.
Product-wise GST – Apply GST taxes to products based on their individual tax rates.
Add HSN Code – Allows you to add HSN codes to your products.
Customize Invoice – Add store logo, name, address, and footer notes to invoice PDFs.
Generates tax slabs with CGST, SGST, and IGST.
PDF Invoice Generation – Auto-generate PDF invoices for each order.
installation_steps: Purchase plugin – Download directly from the website.
Activate the plugin – Use the license key received via email.
Configuring tax slabs – Add single or multiple tax slabs as per product type.
Customize invoice – Add store name, logo, and notes in the invoice PDF footer.

faq.question: How to assign tax slab in GST Plugin?
faq.answer: Log in to your WordPress Admin → WooCommerce → Settings → Tools tab → Enable tax rates and calculations → Tax tab → GST Setting → Select multiple tax slabs and save changes.

faq.question: Where can you use this plugin?
faq.answer: Applicable to all WooCommerce stores across industries like FMCG, electronics, pharmaceuticals, etc.

faq.question: Is WooGST Plugin Pro support limited to a single domain?
faq.answer: Yes. WooGST Plugin Pro is intended for one domain but can also be used in a local development environment.

faq.question: Do WooGST Plugin and WooGST Plugin Pro differ in features?
faq.answer: Yes. The Pro version includes lifetime updates, 1-year free support, custom invoice generation, and HSN code support.

faq.question: What will be the invoice format?
faq.answer: You can view and download sample invoices from the website.

faq.question: Is WooCommerce GST plugin compatible with High-Performance Order Storage (HPOS)?
faq.answer: Yes, by adding specific compatibility code in the `woocommerce-gst-addon.php` file.

pricing_plans: Flexible pricing options with WooCommerce GST Plugin to meet different business needs.
support: For any queries or concerns, contact the team. Technical support is available.
additional_notes: Supports CGST, SGST, and IGST compliance.
Supports meta fields and automatic tax calculations.
Stay updated with new feature releases.
